title: Ghanaian Foreign Minister visits Latvia
summary_full: On 2nd February 2026, the Latvian Minister of Foreign Affairs, Baiba Braže, hosted the visit of the Minister for Foreign Affairs of Ghana, Samuel Okudzeto Ablakwa.
summary_public: On 2nd February 2026, the Latvian Minister of Foreign Affairs, Baiba Braže, hosted the visit of the Minister for Foreign Affairs of Ghana, Samuel Okudzeto Ablakwa.

LV.label: neutral
LV.evidence: Latvian Minister of Foreign Affairs, Baiba Braže, hosted the visit
